verses.verse: וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El Then Samuel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פַּ֥ךְ <S%H6378><s%> pach a vial הַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men of oil וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> vai-yi-Tzok and poured עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho [it] upon his head וַיִּשָּׁקֵ֑הוּ <S%H5401><s%> vai-yish-sha-Ke-hu; and kissed וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer him and said הֲל֗וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo, not כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מְשָׁחֲךָ֧ <S%H4886><s%> me-sha-cha-Cha hath anointed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [Is it] not because the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To heritage לְנָגִֽיד׃ <S%H5057><s%> le-na-Gid. thee [to be] captain

בְּלֶכְתְּךָ֤ <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-te-Cha which thou wentest הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm to day מֵעִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> me-'im-ma-Di, from me וּמָצָאתָ֩ <S%H4672><s%> u-ma-tza-Ta then thou shalt find שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- close קְבֻרַ֥ת <S%H6900><s%> ke-vu-Rat sepulchre רָחֵ֛ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel by Rachel's בִּגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> big-Vul in the border בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min of Benjamin בְּצֶלְצַ֑ח <S%H6766><s%> be-tzel-Tzach; at Zelzah וְאָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru and they will say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about נִמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> nim-tze-'U are found הָאֲתֹנוֹת֙ <S%H860><s%> ha-'a-to-nOt unto thee The asses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָלַ֣כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach-ta went לְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh, to seek וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh now behold נָטַ֤שׁ <S%H5203><s%> na-Tash hath left אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha and lo thy father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei the care הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> ha-'a-to-Not, of the asses וְדָאַ֤ג <S%H1672><s%> ve-da-'Ag and sorroweth לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, for you saying מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh What shall I do לִבְנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> liv-Ni. you

וְחָלַפְתָּ֨ <S%H2498><s%> ve-cha-laf-Ta Then shalt thou go on מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there וָהָ֗לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> va-Hal-'ah, forward וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta from thence and thou shalt come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far אֵל֣וֹן <S%H436><s%> e-Lon to the plain תָּב֔וֹר <S%H8396><s%> ta-Vor, of Tabor וּמְצָא֤וּךָ <S%H4672><s%> u-me-tza-'U-cha and there shall meet שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham and there שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah thee three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim, men עֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lim going up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him to God בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; to Bethel אֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one נֹשֵׂ֣א׀ <S%H5375><s%> no-Se carrying שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three גְדָיִ֗ים <S%H1423><s%> ge-da-Yim, kids וְאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad and another נֹשֵׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se, carrying שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet three כִּכְּר֣וֹת <S%H3603><s%> kik-ke-Rot loaves לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, of bread וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad and another נֹשֵׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se carrying נֵֽבֶל־ <S%H5035><s%> ne-vel- a bottle יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin. of wine

וְשָׁאֲל֥וּ <S%H7592><s%> ve-sha-'a-Lu And they will לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> le-sha-Lom; salute וְנָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu thee and give לְךָ֙ le-Cha שְׁתֵּי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-tei- thee two לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, [loaves] of bread וְלָקַחְתָּ֖ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta which thou shalt receive מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Dam. of their hands

אַ֣חַר <S%H310><s%> 'A-char After כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that תָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo that thou shalt come גִּבְעַ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> giv-'At to the hill הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there נְצִבֵ֣י <S%H5333><s%> ne-tzi-Vei where [is] the garrison פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וִיהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vi-Hi become כְבֹאֲךָ֨ <S%H935><s%> che-vo-'a-Cha and it shall come to pass when thou art come thither שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, to the city וּפָגַעְתָּ֞ <S%H6293><s%> u-fa-ga'-Ta that thou shalt meet חֶ֤בֶל <S%H2256><s%> Che-vel a company נְבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> ne-vi-'Im of prophets יֹרְדִ֣ים <S%H3381><s%> yo-re-Dim coming down מֵֽהַבָּמָ֔ה <S%H1116><s%> me-hab-ba-Mah, from the high place וְלִפְנֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-nei-Hem before נֵ֤בֶל <S%H5035><s%> Ne-vel with a psaltery וְתֹף֙ <S%H8596><s%> ve-Tof and a tabret וְחָלִ֣יל <S%H2485><s%> ve-cha-Lil and a pipe וְכִנּ֔וֹר <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor, and a harp וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah and they מִֽתְנַבְּאִֽים׃ <S%H5012><s%> Mit-nab-be-'Im. them and they shall prophesy

וְצָלְחָ֤ה <S%H6743><s%> ve-tza-le-Chah will come עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha Then ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach And the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְהִתְנַבִּ֖יתָ <S%H5012><s%> ve-hit-nab-Bi-ta upon thee and thou shalt prophesy עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam; them וְנֶהְפַּכְתָּ֖ <S%H2015><s%> ve-neh-pach-Ta with them and shalt be turned לְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish man אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher. into another

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, become כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki shall be when; תְבֹאֶינָה te-vo-'ei-nah כתָבֹ֛אנָה <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo-nah abide קהָאֹת֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> ha-'o-Tot And let it be when these signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these לָ֑ךְ Lach; עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh unto thee [that] thou do לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what תִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza as occasion יָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha, serve כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki shall be when הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him thee for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. and you

וְיָרַדְתָּ֣ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-rad-Ta And thou shalt go down לְפָנַי֮ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before הַגִּלְגָּל֒ <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal me to Gilgal וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יֹרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> yo-Red and behold I will come down אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to you לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> le-ha-'a-Lot unto thee to offer עֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> o-Lot, burnt offerings לִזְבֹּ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> liz-Bo-ach [and] to sacrifice זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> ziv-Chei sacrifices שְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim; of peace offerings שִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days תּוֹחֵל֙ <S%H3176><s%> to-Chel shalt thou tarry עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בּוֹאִ֣י <S%H935><s%> bo-'I till I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to you וְהוֹדַעְתִּ֣י <S%H3045><s%> ve-ho-da'-Ti to thee and shew לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh. thee what thou shalt do

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, happened כְּהַפְנֹת֤וֹ <S%H6437><s%> ke-haf-no-To And it was [so] that when he had turned שִׁכְמוֹ֙ <S%H7926><s%> shich-Mo his back לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet along מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im with שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El, from Samuel וַיַּהֲפָךְ־ <S%H2015><s%> vai-ya-ha-foch- gave ל֥וֹ lo אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> lev heart אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher; him another וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הָאֹת֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> ha-'o-Tot and all those signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh those בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom to pass that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu. he ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And when they came שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there הַגִּבְעָ֔תָה <S%H1389><s%> hag-giv-'A-tah, thither to the hill וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold חֶֽבֶל־ <S%H2256><s%> che-vel- behold a company נְבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> ne-vi-'Im of prophets לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7122><s%> lik-ra-To; met וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> vat-titz-Lach came עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach him and the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God וַיִּתְנַבֵּ֖א <S%H5012><s%> vai-yit-nab-Be upon him and he prophesied בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham. among

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יֽוֹדְעוֹ֙ <S%H3045><s%> yod-'O And it came to pass when all that knew מֵאִתְּמ֣וֹל <S%H865><s%> me-'it-te-Mol before time שִׁלְשׁ֔וֹם <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom, before that time וַיִּרְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U saw וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh now עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with נְבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> ne-vi-'Im among the prophets נִבָּ֑א <S%H5012><s%> nib-Ba; that behold he prophesied וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am then the people אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu, to another מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh he הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah has happened לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> le-ven- What [is] this [that] is come unto the son קִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish, Kish הֲגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> ha-Gam also שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul בַּנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> ban-ne-vi-'Im. the prophets

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an of the same place answered אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And one מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham in it וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi now who אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem; fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken it הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah became לְמָשָׁ֔ל <S%H4912><s%> le-ma-Shal, A proverb הֲגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> ha-Gam also שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul [Is] Saul בַּנְּבִאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> ban-ne-vi-'Im. prophecy

וַיְכַל֙ <S%H3615><s%> vay-Chal And when he had made an end מֵֽהִתְנַבּ֔וֹת <S%H5012><s%> me-hit-nab-Bot, of prophesying וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo he came הַבָּמָֽה׃ <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mah. to the high place
